comments.body:
JFYI: #40050 
If minimal ts version will be 2.8, then we can use [Required](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/release-notes/typescript-2-8.html#example-6). It is good to add `@todo` about this.
I thought about doing this, but the types are slightly different (e.g. `port` cannot be a `number` here)â€”so I don't think we could use that here.
